name: Lucas Symphony
description:
Story:

The beautifull place of Symphony has been invaded by Void Voice. 

All the cell of Symphonia has been muted except one, Lucas. 
Lucas will sing his way through dangerous places, 
fighting the VoidVoice, 
in order tu rescue his friends.

Controls:

 - A/D or Right/Left: To move Lucas!

- Right Mouse Button to Sing.

- Space to Jump.

Thank you!
